title: Advanced English Proficiency Quiz - Hard Mode
description: This quiz challenges your understanding of advanced English grammar, vocabulary, and idiomatic expressions.
instructions: Read each question or prompt carefully.
Provide the most appropriate and advanced response or correction.
Submit your answers after completing all the questions.

items.question: Explain 'to cut corners'.
items.suggestedAnswer: To do something in the easiest or cheapest way, often sacrificing quality.

items.question: Complete the sentence: 'His argument was full of ___.'
Correct the error: 'One of the dogs are missing.'
What does 'esoteric' mean?
items.suggestedAnswer: Intended for or understood by only a small number of people with specialized knowledge.

items.question: Rewrite in active voice: 'The decision was made by the committee.'
Correct this sentence: 'Me and him went to the market.'
items.suggestedAnswer: He and I went to the market.

items.question: Finish the sentence: 'In spite of the heavy rain, they continued their hike with ___.'
What is the meaning of 'to throw in the towel'?
Identify the error: 'Each of the players have their own jersey.'
